meanings.definition: to release an egg from the ovary
meanings.sent1: The female bird ovulates once a month.
meanings.sent2: She ovulates regularly, ensuring the possibility of pregnancy.
meanings.sent3: The hen ovulates like clockwork, never missing a beat.
meanings.sent4: The ovary ovulates its precious cargo, ready for new life.
meanings.sent5: Each month, the ovary ovulates, offering the chance for new beginnings.

meanings.sent1: The cat ovulates during her heat cycle.
meanings.sent2: She ovulates every month, a natural part of her reproductive cycle.
meanings.sent3: The dog ovulates, much to the delight of the male dogs in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The flower ovulates, spreading its pollen far and wide.
meanings.sent5: In spring, nature ovulates, bringing forth new life in abundance.
